name: Gs1
summary: Helpers for building and encoding GS1 element strings (GS1-128).

methods.name: ElementString
methods.summary: Builds a GS1 element string from an AI string like (01)09506000134352(10)ABC(17)240101. Unknown AIs are treated as variable length; use | or GroupSeparator in the input to force a separator.

methods.name: ElementString
methods.summary: Builds a GS1 element string from explicit elements.

methods.name: Encode128
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1-128 barcode from an AI string (parentheses format or raw element string).

methods.name: Encode128
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1-128 barcode from explicit elements.

fields.name: GroupSeparator
fields.summary: ASCII Group Separator (FNC1) used between variable-length GS1 elements.
